question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Platinum Compound in Ovarian Serous Carcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Platinum Compound')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Compound'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Compound')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'serous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Platinum Compound')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (gene:Gene), (therapy:Therapy), (biomarker:Biomarker)
WHERE toLower(gene.symbol) IN [
    'brca1', 'brca2', 'ercc1', 'ercc2', 'ercc3', 'ercc4', 'ercc5', 'ercc6', 'ercc7', 'ercc8', 'ercc9'
]
AND toLower(biomarker.name) CONTAINS 'resistance'
AND toLower(therapy.name) CONTAINS 'platinum'
AND (gene)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(gene)
AND (therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gene)
AND (biomarker)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(therapy)
RETURN DISTINCT therapy.name AS therapy_name, biomarker.name AS biomarker_name, gene.symbol AS gene_symbol
ORDER BY therapy_name
LIMIT 10

question: Show treatments hitting ALK that have biomarker evidence in Stromal Tumour Of Gastrointestinal Tract.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'ALK'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE EXISTS {
  (v)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
}
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g)
WHERE toLower(t.name) CONTAINS 'ALK'
WITH t
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(b.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal tumour of gastrointestinal tract'
RETURN t.name AS therapy_name, b.name AS biomarker_name
LIMIT 10

question: Which therapies target ALK and also have biomarker evidence in Glioblastoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'ALK'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
WHERE EXISTS {
  (v)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
}
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g)
WHERE toLower(t.name) CONTAINS 'alk'
WITH t
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE b.disease_name CONTAINS 'glioblastoma'
RETURN t.name AS therapy_name, b.disease_name AS biomarker_disease, b.effect AS biomarker_effect
ORDER BY therapy_name
LIMIT 10

question: How does SMARCB1 Deletion influence response to Tazemetostat for Epithelioid Sarcoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'SMARCB1 Deletion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Tazemetostat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tazemetostat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tazemetostat')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'epithelioid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'SMARCB1'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE toLower(v.name) CONTAINS 'deletion'
MATCH (t:Therapy {name: 'Tazemetostat'})-[:TARGETS]->(g)
MATCH (d: Disease {name: 'Epithelioid Sarcoma'})
RETURN 
  g.symbol AS gene,
  v.name AS variant,
  t.name AS therapy,
  d.name AS disease,
  coalesce(v.effect, []) AS effect,
  coalesce(v.pmids, []) AS pmids,
  coalesce(v.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(v.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(v.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls,
  coalesce((v.effect), []) AS variant_effect
LIMIT 10

question: Does TP53 Mutation predict response to Eprenetapopt in Malignant Tumor?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'TP53 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Eprenetapopt')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Eprenetapopt'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Eprenetapopt')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'TP53'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE toLower(v.name) CONTAINS 'mutation'
MATCH (t:Therapy {name: 'Eprenetapopt'})
MATCH (d:Disease {name: 'Malignant Tumor'})
RETURN 
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  v.name AS variant_name,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  d.name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(v.effect, []) AS effect,
  coalesce(v.pmids, []) AS pmids,
  coalesce(v.moa, []) AS moa,
  coalesce(v.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(v.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(v.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls,
  coalesce(t.ref_sources, []) AS therapy_ref_sources,
  coalesce(t.ref_ids, []) AS therapy_ref_ids,
  coalesce(t.ref_urls, []) AS therapy_ref_urls
LIMIT 10

question: Which gene is BRAF Wildtype a variant of?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF Wildtype'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol, v.name AS variant_name
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'BRAF'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE toLower(v.name) CONTAINS 'braf wildtype'
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol, v.name AS variant_name
LIMIT 1

question: PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T belongs to which gene?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol, v.name AS variant_name
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = 'pi3kca'
  AND v.name CONTAINS 'h1047r'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047y'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047l'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047d'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047i'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047n'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047p'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047q'
  OR v.name CONTAINS 'h1047t'
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol
LIMIT 10

gold_rows.variant_name: PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Erlotinib in Lung Cancer?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Docetaxel in Stomach Cancer?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene), (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g), (d:Disease {name: 'Stomach Cancer'})
WHERE toLower(d.name) CONTAINS 'stomach cancer'
WITH g, v
WHERE v.effect CONTAINS 'resistance' OR v.effect CONTAINS 'resistant'
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol, v.name AS variant_name
ORDER BY gene_symbol
LIMIT 10

question: List genes associated with resistance to Imatinib Mesylate in Acute Myeloid Leukemia.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene), (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g), (d:Disease {name: 'Acute Myeloid Leukemia'})
WHERE toLower(v.name) CONTAINS 'resistance' AND toLower(d.name) CONTAINS 'acute myeloid leukemia'
WITH g
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol
LIMIT 10

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'VHL c.340+770T>C'})
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  v.consequence AS variant_consequence
LIMIT 100

RETURN v.effect, v.moa, v.pmids, v.ref_sources, v.ref_ids, v.ref_urls
LIMIT 10

question: What is the consequence of the EGFR R705K variant?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR R705K'})
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  v.consequence AS variant_consequence
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'EGFR'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE toLower(v.name) CONTAINS 'r705k'
RETURN v.effect, v.pmids, v.ref_sources, v.ref_ids, v.ref_urls
LIMIT 10

question: What therapies target TOP1 but NOT PSMA1, and have biomarker evidence in Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PSMA1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMA1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments for TOP1 excluding POLD3 that have biomarker evidence in Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('POLD3')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('POLD3'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'TOP1'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)-[:TARGETS]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE toLower(t.name) <> 'pold3'
WITH t
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(b.name) CONTAINS 'ureter small cell carcinoma'
RETURN t.name AS therapy_name, b.name AS biomarker_name
LIMIT 10

question: Show drugs with variant-based evidence in T-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 't-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (v)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) CONTAINS 'tcell acute lymphoblastic leukemia' OR
      toLower(v.name) CONTAINS 'tcell acute lymphoblastic leukemia'
RETURN DISTINCT t.name AS therapy_name, 
       g.symbol AS gene_symbol, 
       v.name AS variant_name,
       coalesce(t.effect, []) AS effect,
       coalesce(t.pmids, []) AS pmids,
       coalesce(t.moa, []) AS moa,
       coalesce(t.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
       coalesce(t.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
       coalesce(t.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 10

question: Which therapies have variant biomarkers in Squamous Cell Carcinomas Of Head And Neck?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (v)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (gene:Gene), (variant:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(gene), (therapy:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gene)
WHERE toLower(gene.symbol) CONTAINS 'squamous cell carcinoma of head and neck'
RETURN therapy.name AS therapy_name
LIMIT 100

question: How does KRAS Mutation influence response to Refametinib for Colorectal Cancer?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'KRAS Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Refametinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Refametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Refametinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'KRAS'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE v.name CONTAINS 'mutation'
OPTIONAL MATCH (t:Therapy {name: 'Refametinib'})-[:TARGETS]->(g)
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:Disease {name: 'Colorectal Cancer'})
RETURN 
  coalesce(v.name, []) as variant,
  coalesce(t.name, []) as therapy,
  coalesce(d.name, []) as disease,
  coalesce(g.effect, []) as gene_effect,
  coalesce(g.moa, []) as mechanism_of_action,
  coalesce(g.ref_sources, []) as references
LIMIT 10

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ribociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ribociclib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ribociclib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
RETURN

  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = 'pi3ca' OR toLower(g.symbol) CONTAINS 'pi3ca'

gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'malignant' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'anus' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE EXISTS {

}

       coalesce(b.effect, []) AS effect,

question: In Naevocarcinoma, which genes confer resistance to Vemurafenib or Dabrafenib?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dabrafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dabrafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene), (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g), (t:Therapy {name: 'Vemurafenib'}), (t2:Therapy {name: 'Dabrafenib'})
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) IN [
    'braf', 'braf1', 'braf2', 'braf-a', 'braf-b', 'braf-1', 'braf-2', 'braf-a1', 'braf-a2'
]
WITH g, v
WHERE toLower(t.name) IN ['vemurafenib', 'dabrafenib']
  AND toLower(t2.name) IN ['vemurafenib', 'dabrafenib']
  AND g.symbol IN [
    'braf'
  ]
  AND (v.effect CONTAINS 'resistance' OR v.effect CONTAINS 'resistant')
  AND g.symbol IN [
    'braf'
  ]
RETURN DISTINCT g.symbol AS gene_symbol, v.name AS variant_name, v.effect AS resistance_effect
ORDER BY gene_symbol, variant_name
LIMIT 10

question: Which treatments target resistance biomarkers for Pemetrexed in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Pemetrexed')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pemetrexed'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pemetrexed')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pemetrexed')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (gene:Gene), (variant:Variant), (therapy:Therapy), (biomarker:Biomarker)
WHERE toLower(gene.symbol) CONTAINS 'pemetrexed' 
  AND (variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(gene)
  AND (biomarker)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(therapy)
  AND toLower(therapy.name) CONTAINS 'resistance'
  AND toLower(biomarker.name) CONTAINS 'resistance'
  AND (gene.name = 'EGFR' OR gene.name = 'KRAS' OR gene.name = 'ALK' OR gene.name = 'PD-L1')
  AND (variant.name CONTAINS 'resistance' OR variant.name CONTAINS 'mutation')
  AND (therapy.name CONTAINS 'targeted' OR therapy.name CONTAINS 'inhibitor')
  AND toLower(biomarker.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung non-small cell carcinoma'
RETURN therapy.name AS therapy_name, biomarker.name AS biomarker_name, gene.symbol AS gene_symbol
ORDER BY therapy.name
LIMIT 10

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Thioguanine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'PRPS1'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant {name: 'D183E'})-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy {name: 'Thioguanine'})
RETURN coalesce(v.pmids, []) as pmids
LIMIT 10

question: What PMIDs support resistance of Axitinib due to BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 F311I?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 F311I'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes that Fedratinib targets.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fedratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fedratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fedratinib')
)
RETURN
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene)
WHERE EXISTS {
  (g)-[:TARGETS]->(t:Therapy)
  WHERE toLower(t.name) CONTAINS 'fedratinib'
}
RETURN g.symbol AS gene_symbol
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs hit TOP1 but not KDR with evidence in Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('KDR')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('KDR'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'TOP1'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WITH v, g
MATCH (g)-[:TARGETS]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE NOT EXISTS {
    (g)-[:TARGETS]->(t2:Therapy)
    WHERE t2.symbol = 'KDR'
}
WITH t, g
MATCH (d:Disease {name: 'Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma'})
WHERE toLower(d.name) CONTAINS toLower('ureter small cell carcinoma')
RETURN t.name AS therapy_name
ORDER BY therapy_name
LIMIT 10

question: What therapies target TOP1 but NOT PSMD6, and have biomarker evidence in Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PSMD6')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMD6'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {symbol: 'TOP1'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(v:Variant)
WHERE v.name CONTAINS 'TOP1'
WITH g, v
MATCH (g)-[:TARGETS]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE NOT EXISTS {
    (g)-[:TARGETS]->(t2:Therapy)
    WHERE t2.symbol = 'PSMD6'
}
WITH t
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(b.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter small cell carcinoma'
RETURN t.name AS therapy_name, b.name AS biomarker_name
LIMIT 10
